verses.roman:
śuni' bhaṭṭācārya śloka karila vyākhyāna
tarka-śāstra-mata uṭhāya vividha vidhāna

synonyms: śuni'-hearing this; bhaṭṭācārya—Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya; śloka—of the verse; karila—did; vyākhyāna—explanation; tarka-śāstra—scriptures dealing with logic; mata—according to; uṭhāya—raises; vividha—various; vidhāna—propositions.
translation: Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya then began to explain the ātmārāma verse, and according to the principles of logic, he put forward various propositions.
